website_summaries.verdict: An impressively powerful, multi-purpose, high-temperature handheld steam cleaner that features 6 versatile cleaning attachments.
pros: This affordable, yet powerful steam cleaner can heat up to over 250 ºF, making it one of the best buys for the price
The accompanying attachments allow this unit to be an asset in nearly every household cleaning situation you face
cons: When using the lockable steam trigger, the pressure may diminish, requiring you to stop until the pressure builds back up again

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this little machine. I unboxed and it came with several attachments including a funnels and small plastic cup to make it easier to fill since the hole is very small. I tested in on our sink right away. Knocked some of the nasty mold right out. My wife used it to clean the entire bathroom and she said it worked very well. I have no problems at all with it. It does what it says it does and it is very affordable. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique C

customer_reviews.title: Handheld steamer gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: The isn't anything to dislike about this product. I couldn't wait to try it out. My first job was the window seal and the sliding glass door tracks. Simply, amazed!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Tabora

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Use to clean around the house in hard to reach areas
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little steamer. Very easy to use and was able to steam my living room in without having to refill. Probably could have steamed couches in family room also. Extensions that steamer comes with are very useful and practical. You'll love this little steamer! Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great for those who prefer steam cleaning versus chemical products
customer_reviews.text: Several attachments gives this steam cleaner a variety of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Braveheart-NJ

customer_reviews.title: Good equipment for basic housecleaning
customer_reviews.text: My first place to test out the Comfort Multi-Purpose Steam Cleaner was my bathroom. I tried it in the shower and the steam made some stains soften up and easier to wipe. I used it around the toilet (teenage boys). I was able to get some of the stains up and around the lid and bottom part of the toilet. Good piece of equipment at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Buschelisa

customer_reviews.title: Small surface cleaning only
customer_reviews.text: I would say 1st of all it’s great for small surfaces n the jug says 175 ml water capacity but it’s way less than suggested , 2nd of all the clip to be pushed to release is hard to press while the pressure is built. Inside . 3rd to get a good steam pressure I would have to wait for a minute to get another burst of pressure. So overall for the price I bought is good n handy for small spot cleaning or in kitchen or bathroom
customer_reviews.author: MESNGH

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: This thing is easy to assemble and will clean just about anything. I didnt even have a scrubber attached to it, just a paper towel, and it got off years of baked on grease in my oven easily. Cleans and sanitizes without harsh chemicals, which is really important in a home of allergy sufferers. I dont know why more people dont use these. I love it for cleaning just about everything. It is light weight, but you may need an extension cord. The cord is long enough to do most rooms, but for larger rooms you will have to move it to different outlets or use and extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Talley

customer_reviews.title: Chemical free cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: Years ago, while living with my grandma - she had one of these. When I moved down the street, we used it to clean out everything. From the fridge to the window sills. I loved it. Unfortunately, when I moved 6 hours away I had to give it back. I had been wanting one for awhile and now that I have a baby, I wanted something I could use to clean without all the chemicals. This works great! I’ve used it on toys, windows sills, my sink...I am glad I finally broke down and got one.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Power steam cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad doesn't clean as well as I had hope. I thought it was controlled.temperature on this but it's just one temperature and then you're running out and you let it ring keeps again, even though there's water in the tank so it has to heat back up and then you can go back to using it again. I had great delivery time on this but when I received it, it was cracked. I tried to contact the seller but had no luck getting ahold of them.
customer_reviews.author: pamela williams

customer_reviews.title: Might have been me but this had problems..
customer_reviews.text: Sorry this didnt work out. The instructions were clear, the steam pressure was excellent. So what was the problem, well some of the attachments did not lock into place making cleaning difficult. I tried several times to see if i had done something wrong but was unable to get it to work. Upside, Amazon has a great return policy and i dropped it at an Amazon return counter inside Kohl's.
customer_reviews.author: Marnier

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy find other good one
customer_reviews.text: The hose piece was broken and I have not gotten to use it at all. The steamer is fine then only problem is way to hard to unscrew top opening Seriously half the time it takes forever to try to unscrew it and other times I stop trying. And don't use it cause I can't open it to put any water in it. Plus you have to wait like a hour between each use because as long as it a little warm it has a lock not to open until cold. It sucks And it hurts my hands to try to open but most of the time I can't open it. I wish I didn't buy it
customer_reviews.author: Cari Rawson

customer_reviews.title: So happy I bought this steamer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bathroom, instead of one of the much more expensive products especially made for that purpose. Also is excellent for steam cleaning kitchen counter tops.I used in kitchen, just as most I love it. Pure fresh cleaning no orders and everything I have tried to clean with it sparkles. I only have one issue, I wish I could lock stay on continuous steam longer time. I need to fill in water after intervals other than that its great .
customer_reviews.author: Satish Atmuri

customer_reviews.title: Good for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: Good product however, water doesn't come out as steam when the padded cover is applied. I tried using this on my bed and water literally shot out in huge puddle like drops. Not cool. Otherwise, good for cleaning window seals , counter tops, and door knobs. Maybe i'm using it incorrectly. Anyway, ended up keeping.
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: I had a Bissell that used to leave everything sparkly clean. This feels like hot air. I don't feel it cleans as well. It heats up quickly and the pressure feels great. I can hold on an area and it won't remove dirt. So I feel it is decent for disinfecting but not great for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Not the hottest
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work well- pressure is very good-but the steam is barely even warm unless the tip of the nozzle is DIRECTLY against the surface of the item to be cleaned/sanitized. I can put my hand right through it maybe an inch from the nozzle at full blast and it’s just a bit warm.
customer_reviews.author: dion campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool for melting the built up ice in a freezer
customer_reviews.text: I have used this steamer to help expedite by process of thawing out the frost build up in our freezer that does not have auto defrost. This steamer allows me to have the freezer back up and running within an hour since I am no longer waiting for the ice build up to melt.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan H.

customer_reviews.title: Bedbugs!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I know you don't want to hear about bedbugs when looking at a review BUT that is why I bought this steamer. And guess what??? It worked!!! It took a few times and a few weeks using the steam on the mattresses and wherever else I thought they might be but we got rid of them with no professional help at all!! No chemicals!! Just steam! Oh, and they haven't returned either. But I'm ready if they do!! I've also used this to clean my windows, steam clothing and make coffee..Nah, not really. LOL This is an amazing tool to have around!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberle

customer_reviews.title: Every clean freak should own this semester!
customer_reviews.text: This steamer works wonders on the bathroom toilet. We are going through a remodel and there was so much dust and grime stuck to the toilets, this steamed just got rid of all the grime in seconds. This is a must have for any clean freak.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Good for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the price, its small size that meets my storage consideration needs, and its ease of use by virtue of being compact, lightweight, easily transportable. The trade off for the above is a small length of time before needing a refill. Cleaning more than one item, large items, or grungier items takes multiple fillings. But then a steamer with the capacity to do the above would be bulkier, heavier, and pricier.
customer_reviews.author: parrotmom

customer_reviews.title: Handheld steamer
customer_reviews.text: Mainly used for deicing freezers. Works great. Easy to use. Like the safety features. Gets hot fast.
customer_reviews.author: Baub

customer_reviews.title: Hmm ... only one attachment works/fits
customer_reviews.text: Tabs not fitting into guide/holes .... frustrating. Only one nozzle fits.
customer_reviews.author: K Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This machine would be better named a Steam Sanitizer rather than a Steam Cleaner. It is easy to use it just doesn't clean . I tried it on the sink, the outside of the toilet and in the shower and not even a patch of dried soap came clean. I was not expecting anything heavy duty but I was expecting a machine that would at least do a little spot cleaning and I didn't even get that.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: This is worth the money paid for it
customer_reviews.text: I would call this a starter item to see if you like steam cleaning items. For small jobs this is ideal. If you decide you like the way it cleans you can check out larger steamers.
customer_reviews.author: rodney

customer_reviews.title: Steamer  lasts for 2 hours and it stops working.
customer_reviews.text: This steam cleaner lasted one HOUR total refilled 2 times and never heated up again. The indicator light here came on again and no steam. Called customer service, replacement free , 7-9 day delivery. Now on my 2 week wait, no steam cleaner yet! How this steamer made it high on the reviews for one of the best steamer is pathetic, who pays for these reviews concordat !
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Bad example of a steamer,  it’s horrible
customer_reviews.text: We tried , shower tiles , I wanted to use This for car detailing, door jams and what not, I I tried you guys, I really did, it simply does not heat! I even used DI water!
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: NO NO NO!!
customer_reviews.text: I plugged it in, put on attachment... let it heat up... used it on half of a t-shirt to test... waited for a second to see the results. went to switch the nozzle piece... fell right off... it was softened and when trying to unlatch it was like taffy and came off with nozzle attachment
customer_reviews.author: Aarion Gross

customer_reviews.title: Steamer
customer_reviews.text: Instead of pushing the trigger to get steam it has a silly safety switch that makes operation difficult. Only holds 1 measure of water so steam supply is of short duration. All parts squashed into a corrugated cardboard box that will soon disintegrate I previously had a similar unit that came in a purpose made formed polystyrene packaging with a enclosing sleeve that made storage easy, had no trigger switch and took 1 1/2 measures of water
customer_reviews.author: alan morris

customer_reviews.title: Steam is supposed to be hot. This steam isn't.
customer_reviews.text: I could wash my bare skin with this thing and it'd barely be uncomfortable. Pretty useless. Wish I could return it at this point.
customer_reviews.author: bennett

customer_reviews.title: Steems but not much pressure.
customer_reviews.text: Pros... Small and easily stored. Inexpensive. Can be used for a variety of cleaning jobs. Sanatizes. Cons... There is a good amount of steam but doesnt seem to pressurize very well. Has too many parts.
customer_reviews.author: MoMo Stein

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me!
customer_reviews.text: So I'm not sure how well it cleans. I'm an appliance tech and I use it to dethaw ice from the evaporator. If you are using a heat gun you need an 1100 watt or higher blow dryer. If you have a blow dryer you need this. This thing is amazing! All the steam need to be discharged with it unplugged to open the cap for refilling.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Deep cleansing
customer_reviews.text: This is AMAZING! My bathroom looks like new. It was a godsend product, I am remodeling my home and while painting we made a mess, the wood floor had paint spots and this steamer help me to lift the paint and clean the floors.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: look its ok but i also had to buy an adapter for NZ so be warned about that. its not as great as i thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: sandra gildea

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I use it to defrost fridge if there is a lot of snow on evaporator. This one works mach better and powerful than my old 2 years stimmer. It has some new updates wich I like. Not sure how it cleans but for me works well.
customer_reviews.author: stupin94

customer_reviews.title: It works very well
customer_reviews.text: The explosion is adequate enough to clean the accessories and the grout. I want the tank to help with more water, but it came to what I needed. I am currently using it in more than one automotive application. Waste and oil cleaning and carpet disinfection. It works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Barber

customer_reviews.title: Top defective
customer_reviews.text: Used it first time went to unscrew water cap and it just spun and never came off
customer_reviews.author: Ronhauck

customer_reviews.title: I so wanted this to work
customer_reviews.text: This did not clean my oven like I wanted it to. I do not like it and did not feel steam helped clean.
customer_reviews.author: Trudi Clay

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Heats up and softens plastic parts extremely fast. Hard to do anything more than spot cleaning. Made purchase hopping to clean caulking in shower but after about 5 minute plastic pieces started to soften and deform.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Pretty much same as previous one. Hope it lasts longer. Very good steam action so far.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppinBoy

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner is very useful, it really helps in cleaning some very dirty areas in the house. Like the baking bench in the kitchen, my wife usually needs to spend some time cleaning it up, but for now, that's a piece of cake this cleaner can make.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Palacio

customer_reviews.title: Short Lived
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for various cleaning purposes and was happy with its performance. However one of the three power prongs fell out and is lodged in my power outlet. I would recommend purchasing a more premium product.
customer_reviews.author: Harrison Meek

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner has an issue
customer_reviews.text: Ive only had mine for a few months and havnt used much nor have I damaged in any way but fill cap will not remove the plastic top spins freely but will not catch the plug bolt and unscrew no matter how much pressure I apply and yes it is fully cooled off and no preassure in the tank
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible buy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. The steam came out from the lid like explosion. It can injure someone really bad. I would like a refund please. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Álvaro

customer_reviews.title: I returned it.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to replace harsh chemical with steam clean and it does not do that. Cold steam that just wet the surface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend it for ironing, but its not bad for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use, but a little bit hard for my hand after 5 minutes of use when ironing curtains. I do not recommend it for ironing. But It’s not bad for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Maryna F.

customer_reviews.title: Weak steam and pressure
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but not very much steam kind of a weak pressure
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Ciubuc

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I like steamers for disinfection. This ocean liner provides more water pressure than I expected Also, you can do more work due to the water capacity before you need to refill. In addition, it contains many kits with many cleaning solutions.
customer_reviews.author: mary henley

customer_reviews.title: Clean
customer_reviews.text: Very interesting investment! Children often put food on the furniture, it's really a headache. Fortunately, this machine I can now use to clean and disinfect.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Hill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent work
customer_reviews.text: This little one is a great job. I used it in my kitchen. For the first time, use it. It really cleans my old kitchen fan. This is easy to clean and use.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Sabella

customer_reviews.title: Wished I didn't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would clean tiled showers. Very disappointed it sits in its box now.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my son. He is very happy with it. He can't wait to used it on windows...hopefully mine.
customer_reviews.author: Dolphin6411

customer_reviews.title: Love to steam clean
customer_reviews.text: I discovered steam cleaning I love it even bought steam mop
customer_reviews.author: KimLindzie75

customer_reviews.title: Good product but expect buying a new one on or about every 6 months
customer_reviews.text: it works well, its ready quite quick, the only issue is that you will be buying one about every 6 months since they dont last much.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: The second time I used it, it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I do not like that it quit working, the second time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris watts

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I used this to steam build up in shower. It worked fine. I have only used iTunes once so far.
customer_reviews.author: Prissy

customer_reviews.title: Pig in a bag !
customer_reviews.text: This product is manufactured to work with 110 volt supply and is advertised for kitchen use. This would mean not suitable for market in Ireland. Information relating to power rating, power supply, safety, etc was not included with product. Risk of serious danger without relevant information.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Keep it clean.
customer_reviews.text: It did the job but it dose need to heat up a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great job cleaning but.....
customer_reviews.text: Would have been 5 stars but the button does not lock. I love everything else about it. I just can’t get the button to lock down. Not worth returning I’ll just use it as is.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Tooze

customer_reviews.title: None
customer_reviews.text: Used the unit and worked well. The was purchased to replace an older 25 year unit.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Gross

customer_reviews.title: Handy for quick cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it's a great product for long run but works fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amz Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fast to clean!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy is to use it, for everyday cleaning. It is compact and can be stored in my kitchen cabinets. I can clean the drapes fast and easy too. Definitely recommending this one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: It only gives out steam for about 30 seconds. Then you have to wait a long time or empty and start over to get another 30 seconds of steam. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Easy-to-use and can be used for a variety of tasks. With any deep-cleaning however, it struggles in terms of actual removal of debris and dirt. Excellent sanitizer though. Would recommend for cleaning odd-shaped spots in bathrooms and for other small objects.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very good project
customer_reviews.text: Works great for SMALL projects. Cools down too quickly and requires time for larger projects.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Did a great job
customer_reviews.text: Great used it to detail cars. Light weight and a good amount of steam. Would like the reheat light either brighter or up at the top. Would be great some idea I know the water level.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Filippi

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This product is defective, attachments don't fit. Impossible to open area to pour water in and leaves water everywhere complete waste of money
customer_reviews.author: JPS

customer_reviews.title: Very useful in this Covid season
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good product. I use it in my medical office to sanitize the office at the end of the day. I add a little disinfectant to the water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to use for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Easy to use and its great to get to the hard to reach areas, such as the floor boards behind the toilet seat. Great for steaming garments. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque Giagni

customer_reviews.title: Fast and clean
customer_reviews.text: I used this to wash my carpet and humidifier. It cleans very well and fast. I would recommend this to everyone.

customer_reviews.title: water capacity
customer_reviews.text: used 3 time vapor stop after few minutes, take to many refill, time to warm up. not efective as i expected

customer_reviews.title: This product is great
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's powerful and very compact. Produces a lot of steam and has various attachments

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it... you will not regret buying this. You need to keep it plugged while using otherwise it would not work :)

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It works so well that I buy it for my range and it removes sticky oil quickly and easily and if there is still hot water inside you can't open the lid it's so safe.

customer_reviews.title: Not appropriate for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to use for fabric blinds, not so good. Returning item. It may be amazing for other surfaces and areas, just not for my purpose.

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure steam cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and deep cleaning. It was a wonderful job. Great for the price! Good buy!

customer_reviews.title: Good for sure
customer_reviews.text: A very good steam cleaning product, used to clean some difficult to remove grease stains, and some difficult to clean places have good results, very good.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, the steam can quickly and effectively clean the oil, the necessary choice at home, the cleaning hood is very good, highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to carry around
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a few weeks. Heats up lovey.. Water tank perfect size. We use it all the time.

customer_reviews.title: Use with caution
customer_reviews.text: This steamboat creates wonders in the kitchen, windows, rugs and furniture. Can't wait to use it to explain my car in the fall.

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it is easy to use and the instructions are very clear. I've always wanted a steam cleaner and made the right choice.

customer_reviews.title: Has a saftey switch.
customer_reviews.text: Helps me do everything from removing decopage glue on large window, to making the bathroom shine.

customer_reviews.text: i am very pleased, unit is powerful, easy to use and well made

customer_reviews.text: no dislikes it worked for me to help loosen crud on old chain saws to help clean them up .

product_meta.title: Comforday Multi-Purpose Handheld Pressurized Steam Cleaner with 9-Piece Accessories for Stain Removal, Carpets, Curtains, Car Seats, Kitchen Surface & Much More (Yellow)
feature_bullets: ★Nine free accessories to adapt cleaner to every situation: Stairs, carpet, clothing, car interior and rims, etc. Gets into hard to reach areas.
★Multi-surface use: Works on every surface including laminate, hardwood, fabric, upholstery, ceramic, linoleum, glass, marble and granite.
★Chemical free and safe: The Comforday steamer is safe. It is completely chemical free and it is secured with a safety lock and safety cap.
★Powerful hot steam: Heat and pressure gets the job done faster. QUICKSTEAMTM technology offers 1050W of power; providing pressurized powerful hot steam (250-270F) for up to 15-20 minutes.
★Cuts through dirt: Tackle the biggest messes such as grout, grease and stains easily and quickly.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars619 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
